Title: Sentinel alert to autonomous action: A guide to controlled AI | ODSP1483
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
When a critical alert triggers in Microsoft Sentinel, every second matters. This session shows how to bridge the gap between detection and response with custom Blink micro agents and workflows integrated into Sentinel. Learn a practical framework for AI-driven responses that are fast, safe, controlled, and tailored to your environment.
